law.catch_line: Authority to issue permit for shipment of injurious plant pests.
law.text: When application is made, the state entomologist may issue a permit for shipment into or within the Commonwealth of injurious plant pests for research or diagnostic purposes.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1996.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/96). In creating the tables for the 1996 Kentucky Acts, this statute was assigned the number KRS 249.032. The statute was renumbered as KRS 249.102 during codification.
